bill_title: limit Board of Regents tuition and fees increases.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to limit Board of Regents tuition and fees increases. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That § 13-53-6 be amended to read as follows: 13-53-6. The board shall fix all rates of tuition and other fees to be paid by students. However, the board may not implement any new fee, nor increase tuition and existing fees collected at the system level, except general activity fees and room and board, more than the lesser of three percent per year or the rate of inflation, which is the annual percentage change in the consumer price index for urban wage earners and clerical workers as computed by the Bureau of Labor Statistics, United States Department of Labor, for the year prior to the year immediately preceding the year of adjustment, without the approval of the Legislature. The provisions of this section are subject to any outstanding covenants with the holders of bonds issued by the Board of Regents or the South Dakota Building Authority. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in Senate and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
